prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who spreads the earth upon the waters — ground me in stability.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 16:8: "I have set the Lord always before me; He is at my right hand, I will not be shaken."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 24:27: "Prepare your work outside; get everything ready, then build your house."
prayer.intention: Guide my hands today as I build — let every line of code, every decision, every conversation serve Your purposes.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai — Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.

family.title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family Focus
family.suggestion: Build a Super Wings airport with Jones using blocks or cardboard boxes — he'll love being Jett the delivery plane!
family.conversationStarter: What book are you reading right now? Any good ones you'd recommend?
family.weeklyGoal: Monthly date night is due soon — start planning something special with Jillian
family.potencyAction: Give her space if she needs it, then come back with a genuine apology

relationshipStatus.note: Below 5:1 threshold. Focus on repair — acknowledge recent conflicts without defending. Increase acts of service.

family.reflection: The ratio is off. Today's priority: listen without fixing, acknowledge without defending. Quality > quantity.
